name: DeadRiot -- Zombie Shooter. Hack, slash and blast hordes of zombies!
name_original: DeadRiot -- Zombie Shooter. Hack, slash and blast hordes of zombies!
description:
Fight, shoot & blast your way through the zombie apocalypse. Can you survive Dead Riot?

You are the last hope for a city under siege by the undead. Destroy the zombie hordes and restore order to a world plunged into chaos.

- Action packed beat-em-up game
- Multiple combat formats including hand-to-hand combat and weapons to kill zombies.
- Multiple levels of tense game play.
- Upgradeable weapons and equipment.
- Easy and intuitive game play.
- Challenging enemies and environments.
- Online leaderboards to view your stats and show off your scores.
- Gamecenter support.
- High quality comic book style graphics and full retina support.

Dispatch the undead horde in many ways.

- Blow them away with devastating weapons.
- End their misery with explosives.
- Beat them down with lethal martial arts combos.
- Stomp their heads.
